Articles.Content:
I modeled a part in which I wish to animate when activated via right-click menu and/or action group hotkey.

I have VS2013 installed and adequate C# experience, but I just can't figure out how to get animations to work.

could someone please post some sample code for me to learn from?

> 
> I modeled a part in which I wish to animate when activated via right-click menu and/or action group hotkey.
> I have VS2013 installed and adequate C# experience, but I just can't figure out how to get animations to work.
> 
> could someone please post some sample code for me to learn from?

This is made in the config of the part by adding a module 'ModuleAnimateGeneric'. See more details [on the wiki](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Module#ModuleAnimateGeneric). I don't think you need C# experience for that since everything you can change is in the config of the part. I think you'll have more informations in the 'Modelling anTexturing' section than here.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-04T07:25:39Z" title="07/04/2015 07:25  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 4, 2015</time> by simon56modder**
You don't need C#, you can animate in unity. Window... Animation.
